title: The Trendtations 5/20: National Rescue Dogs Day, NBA, Chris Cuomo, Israel / Palestine, J6 Commission
itunes:title: The Trendtations 5/20: National Rescue Dogs Day, NBA, Chris Cuomo, Israel / Palestine, J6 Commission
description:
On this edition of The Trendtations Jack and Miles discuss National Rescue Dogs Day, NBA news, Chris Cuomo advising his brother on harassment allegations, Israel's ethnic cleansing of Palestine, the potential for a "Jan. 6th" commission.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
